title: LTMToolkit
subtitle: Web service for Amazon's Enterprise Translations Organization.
bullets: Reimplemented UI and extended endpoints of service for Amazon’s Enterprise Translation Orchestration team, allowing deprecation of old UI.

title: Day by Day
subtitle: First-place Android application submitted for SASEHack 2020.
bullets: Android application to evaluate users for mental illnesses and redirect them to local help. Implemented evaluation algorithm based on the APA’s Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Diseases.
